live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52917.summary: Some customers in the Ross Glen area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52917.title: Aug 29 - Medicine Hat (Ross Glen) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
